scripts.build:debug: next build || (echo '========== BUILD FAILED DEBUG INFO ==========' && echo 'Node version:' && node -v && echo 'NPM version:' && npm -v && echo 'Next.js version:' && npx next --version && echo 'Files in src:' && find src -type f -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' | head -20 && echo 'Package.json dependencies:' && cat package.json | grep -A 50 'dependencies' && exit 1)
scripts.clean:env: echo 'Environment files (.env.local) kept for reuse. Delete manually if needed.'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:cache && npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:env && echo '✅ Complete cleanup finished! All development artifacts removed.'
scripts.setup: npm install && echo '✅ Development environment ready! Run: npm run dev'
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run setup
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run verify-deployment && npm run build:sliplane
